tasks.name: addresses
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { address { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message } } } } }}

tasks.name: contact_point_types
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { contact_point_type { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message } } } } }}

tasks.name: contact_points
tasks.mutation: mutation{ master_data { contact_point { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message } } } } }}

tasks.name: organizations
tasks.mutation: mutation mutateOrganizations($var: [IIoRestorecommerceOrganizationOrganization!]!){ master_data { organization { Mutate( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message } } } } }}

tasks.name: codes
tasks.mutation: mutation mutateCodes($var: [IIoRestorecommerceCodeCode!]!){ catalog { code { Mutate( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { details{items {status {id, code, message}}, operationStatus { code message } } } } }}
